name: Lab Breach
description:
Summary
Lab Breach is a game where you are a scientist in a laboratory where the test subjects have escaped and picked up guns. It is your goal to kill all the slimes and travel between the different levels of the lab.

You can collect slime coins where you can buy weapons, ammo and hp with to get further in the lab.

Note
This is the first game I made by my self. I made every thing myself except the music and sound effects. I gave my self around a month to finish this project and worked on it during my free time. I had to cut some content to finish it in the time frame so it could feel a little bit shallow/empty. I might work on it in the future but for now I find it enjoy able enough to play for a few minutes.

I hope you guys enjoy it and if you have any feedback feel free to comment.
